statements: SELECT * FROM vehicle_locations WHERE vehicle_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT vehicle_id, speed FROM vehicle_locations ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT latitude, longitude FROM vehicle_locations WHERE speed > 60;
SELECT vehicle_id, longitude, latitude FROM vehicle_locations WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM vehicle_locations WHERE speed IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_locations ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT vehicle_id, latitude, longitude FROM vehicle_locations WHERE speed > 50 ORDER BY speed DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_count, AVG(speed) AS average_speed FROM vehicle_locations WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT vehicle_id, timestamp, speed FROM vehicle_locations WHERE latitude BETWEEN 40.0 AND 50.0 AND longitude BETWEEN -75.0 AND -65.0;
SELECT vehicle_id, timestamp FROM vehicle_locations WHERE timestamp >= '2022-02-01' AND speed IS NOT NULL ORDER BY timestamp;
SELECT * FROM Locations;
SELECT vehicle_id, latitude, longitude FROM Locations WHERE location_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM Routes WHERE distance > 50 ORDER BY estimated_time DESC;
SELECT start_location_id, end_location_id, distance FROM Routes WHERE vehicle_id = 3;
SELECT route_id, end_location_id, estimated_time FROM Routes WHERE route_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT * FROM Locations WHERE latitude > 40.0 ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT location_id, latitude, longitude FROM Locations WHERE vehicle_id = 5 AND latitude < 50.0 ORDER BY location_id ASC;
SELECT route_id, vehicle_id, distance FROM Routes WHERE distance > 100 ORDER BY route_id;
SELECT start_location_id, end_location_id, distance FROM Routes WHERE vehicle_id = 10 ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT location_id, latitude, longitude FROM Locations WHERE latitude BETWEEN 35.0 AND 45.0 ORDER BY location_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_locations;
SELECT vehicle_id, location_geometry FROM vehicle_locations;
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location FROM routes;
SELECT vehicle_id, route_id, start_time FROM vehicle_routes;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_routes WHERE end_time IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_locations WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
SELECT vehicle_id, location_geometry FROM vehicle_locations WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location FROM routes ORDER BY route_id DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, route_id, start_time, end_time FROM vehicle_routes WHERE start_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT vehicle_id, route_id, start_time, end_time FROM vehicle_routes INNER JOIN vehicle_locations ON vehicle_routes.vehicle_id = vehicle_locations.vehicle_id;
SELECT * FROM vehicles;
SELECT vehicle_name, location_lat, location_long FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM routes ORDER BY route_id DESC;
SELECT stop_name, location_lat, location_long FROM stops WHERE location_lat > 40;
SELECT route_id, stop_id, sequence_num FROM route_steps WHERE sequence_num BETWEEN 2 AND 5;
SELECT * FROM vehicles ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT vehicle_name, location_lat, location_long FROM vehicles WHERE location_lat > 0;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location, distance FROM routes WHERE distance BETWEEN 10 AND 20;
SELECT route_name, stop_name FROM routes r JOIN route_steps rs ON r.route_id = rs.route_id JOIN stops s ON rs.stop_id = s.stop_id WHERE s.location_lat > 0;
SELECT route_name, stop_name, sequence_num FROM routes r LEFT JOIN route_steps rs ON r.route_id = rs.route_id LEFT JOIN stops s ON rs.stop_id = s.stop_id ORDER BY sequence_num ASC;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_location;
SELECT driver_id, name, license_plate FROM driver;
SELECT trip_id, start_time, end_time FROM trip ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location, distance FROM route WHERE distance > 100;
SELECT trip_id, alert_type, timestamp FROM alert WHERE alert_type = 'Speeding';
SELECT * FROM vehicle_location WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM route ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT driver_id, name FROM driver WHERE license_plate LIKE 'ABC%';
SELECT trip_id, start_time, end_time FROM trip WHERE start_time > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT * FROM alert WHERE alert_type IN ('speeding', 'accident') ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
